 Molly to the defeated bandits[4][ edit]
 Molly uses Charm Person to convince the bandits to keep their clothes but leave their weapons and strive for a more honest way of life. Caleb regains consciousness and immediately begins to pull out the arrows, much to everyone's opposition.
